actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the refusal of nonimmigrant visas in certain instances.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of State to deny nonimmigrant visas to citizens of countries which discriminate in the issuance of nonimmigrant visas to United States citizens on the basis of race, color, religion, sex or national origin. Provides for periodic review by the Secretary and for a waiver of such sanction by the President.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the refusal of nonimmigrant visas in certain instances.
